input_text:
Job Title: Senior Software Engineer - Open Source

Location: San Francisco Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Reflex is an open-source framework to build web apps in pure Python and deploy them with a single command. This can be anything from a small data science/internal app to a large multi-page web app.
We launched in December and have seen rapid adoption of our open-source framework, with over 16K GitHub Stars and 10,000 users on the waitlist for our hosting service. In parallel with improving our open-source framework, we are now working on a hosting service so users can quickly deploy and scale their apps. We raised 5M in seed funding in August led by Lux Capital and YC with some fantastic founders as angel investors.
Github: https://github.com/reflex-dev/reflexIntroduction: https://reflex.dev/docs/getting-started/introduction/ Our Recent PH Launch: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/reflex-6
The Role: 
Weâ€™re looking for a fantastic SF/Bay Area-based senior software engineer comfortable working on a very early product in a quickly changing codebase and role. 
This role will involve leading the development and design of some of our open-source projects. You should be comfortable with a high level of ownership over product decisions and the tech stack.
Responsibilities:Help optimize and improve our open-source project. Design and implement new features and ensure that Reflex is well-tested and maintained.Take an active role in the Reflex community by seeking feedback, integrating contributions, and fostering positive and collaborative relationships.
What We Look for:Extensive Python experienceStrong intuition on system design.Passion for open source software and contributing to open source communities.Strong knowledge of frontend web technologies such as React, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Interview Process;The entire process is fully remote; all communication will happen via email and video chat.Once you've submitted your application, the team will review your submission and may reach out with a take home technical interview.After the screen, there will be 2-3 technical interviews, each around 45 minutes.The last step is a call with both founders.Once the interviews are over, the team will meet to discuss several roles and candidates and may be asked one or two follow-up questions over email or a quick call or go directly to make an offer.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Senior Software Engineer - Open Source
output_json.summary: Reflex is an open-source framework to build web apps in pure Python and deploy them with a single command.
job_responsibilities: Help optimize and improve our open-source project.
Design and implement new features and ensure that Reflex is well-tested and maintained.
Take an active role in the Reflex community by seeking feedback, integrating contributions, and fostering positive and collaborative relationships.
output_json.company_information: Reflex is an open-source framework to build web apps in pure Python and deploy them with a single command.

other.content: The entire process is fully remote; all communication will happen via email and video chat. Once you've submitted your application, the team will review your submission and may reach out with a take home technical interview. After the screen, there will be 2-3 technical interviews, each around 45 minutes. The last step is a call with both founders. Once the interviews are over, the team will meet to discuss several roles and candidates and may be asked one or two follow-up questions over email or a quick call or go directly to make an offer.
